short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do more work with less effort.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web platforms are used extensively in the workplace. However, the user usually has to learn how a platform is structured, maybe even become an expert. Then, the user has to perform tedious clicks, type, do form submissions, etc again & again for the same tasks. workerB lets the user increase her productivity by automating anything from a few clicks to a complex workflow into a single action.
